inclusion.criterion: symptomatic gallstones or gallstone induced mild pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ASA classification I, II or III
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous cholecystitis or moderate to severe pancreatitis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previous laparoscopic surgery or open surgery on vagina, uterus, fallopian tubes or ovaries. Except laparoscopic sterilisation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: daily consumption of any analgesic for one month prior to surgery or intermittent use of opioids.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: ongoing treatment with Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitors or Tricyclic antidepressants.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known with any type of inflammatory bowel disease.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptomatic gallstones and is booked for elective cholecystectomy. She meets most inclusion criteria but has a history of hypercholesterolemia which may be considered as chronic disease causing pain sensations, thus making her likely ineligible due to exclusion criterion.
